properties.name: Austin
properties.address: 7010 Easy Wind Drive, Suite 150, Austin, TX 78752
properties.notes: We are starting to run into capacity limits with the regular patrons, so we request that you reserve your space for Tuesday. You can do this at the Vigilante website or by calling them. This isn't mandatory, but will ensure your team has seating when you arrive.

properties.name: Bangalore
properties.address: 2nd floor, 777/I, 100 Feet Rd, HAL 2nd Stage, , Indiranagar, Bengaluru, KA 560008
properties.notes: Registration link: https://insider.in/puzzled-pint-bangalore-april-2023/event

properties.name: Bay Area - San Francisco
properties.notes:
San Francisco game control volunteers will be hosting Puzzled Pint at two San Francisco locations again this month. Come puzzle with us at either venue.

The Napper Tandy at 3200 24th Street in the Mission District

Enjoy Irish pub food, drinks, and ambiance along with your puzzles at The Napper Tandy. Now with their winter set up including more heat lamps for the outdoor seats and more seating and lighting in the back room for indoor teams. We're looking forward to taking advantage of the outdoor seating in the nicer weather, so look for game control outside by the door to pick up a puzzle set.

OR

Willkommen at 2198 Market Street in Castro/Hayes Valley

Solve your puzzles with us over craft beers and German-American food at the Willkommen beer hall. Features both indoor and outdoor seating, though the outdoor table surface may be somewhat less conducive to puzzling. Consider bringing a good writing surface if you prefer the outdoor option; we'll try to have some on hand to loan. Note that this location closes at 9pm, so we won't be able to stay beyond that.

properties.name: Bay Area - Silicon Valley
properties.notes:
6:30 - 9pm.

We were unable to find a location this month to host us so we're emailing packets! If you have suggestions for locations please email us at puzzledpintsv@gmail.com.

Teams should register for a virtual puzzle set at: https://forms.gle/7WDqUY56Ua13tdyr7

properties.name: Boston
properties.notes:
Please let us know if you plan to attend at https://pp-rsvp.com/U6RBLV.

NOTE that the brewery does not serve food! However, there are other places in Bow Market where you can order food.

properties.name: Boulder
properties.notes:
PLEASE NOTE: There are multiple Murphy's in Boulder County - we're meeting at the one in Louisville!

We're back at the Louisville Murphy's Tap House! Check with the host stand to get a table / see if we have a reserved section, and come pick up puzzles from us at the Game Control table.

properties.name: Brno
properties.notes: Write to Yeti (yeti@physics.muni.cz) if you plan to come. If you want a reservation, make one yourself. Thanks!

properties.name: Central NJ
properties.notes:
Just look for the Puzzled Pint sign on my table, and I'll give you puzzles!

-Justin

properties.name: Charlottesville
properties.notes:
Matchbox @ Stonefield

Back at Matchbox again this month. They have pizza, burgers, and drinks. You are also welcome to grab the puzzle set from us and go to any of the other restaurants at Stonefield (though it'll be harder for us to give you hints if you do).

Please RSVP at puzzledpintcho@gmail.com if you're definitely or probably coming.

properties.name: Chicago - City North
properties.address: 3400 N Damen Ave, City North, IL 60657
properties.notes:
Back at Commonwealth!

RSVP: https://pp-rsvp.com/5SB2NR

properties.name: Chicago - City South
properties.notes: Marz Brewing! Find us in the back!

properties.name: Christchurch
properties.notes:
Hello Puzzlers,

this month we're meeting at Cascade Bar, in Stranges Lane :)

We will have the venue to ourselves, but please place your booking by sending an email to manager@soulquarter.co.nz with your name and the number of people. Please note that you will not receive a confirmation until Tuesday Morning, due to the long weekend.

The manager is asking to place food orders for the whole table at once, rather than one person at a time, hopefully this will not be too inconvenient :)

Have a good Easter break, and see you at the pub!

properties.name: Columbia, Maryland
properties.address: 8872 McGaw Road, Suite A, Columbia , MD 21045
properties.notes: Looking forward to seeing everyone!

properties.name: Columbus
properties.bar: Beer Barrel Pizza and Grill - Easton
properties.notes: Heading back East this month, this place is Easton adjacent

properties.notes:
RSVP at https://www.facebook.com/events/731333365297462/?ref=newsfeed to help us estimate number of packets needed!
our host venue is also launching their new King of the Hill inspired beer "Propane and Propane Accessories" and up to their own shenanigans, including a Boggle tournament and costume contest. RSVP to their event over at https://facebook.com/events/s/beer-release-propane-and-propa/6280463432017258/

properties.name: Denver
properties.notes: See you there!

properties.name: Houston

properties.notes:

For more info, visit us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PuzzPintHSV or Twitter: https://twitter.com/PuzzPintHSV

properties.name: Jersey City/Hoboken
properties.notes: We're excited to launch our very first puzzled pint in Hoboken/Jersey City! Ann and Randy will be hosting - please take a look for the table with the PP marker and we'll get you a set!

properties.name: Kansas City
properties.notes: Sorry to have to miss this month. Cory is in Japan and I (Seth) have go to a job site last minute and didn't have any other days I could schedule it. Promise to make it next month! Any regulars wanting this months set can reach out to our Facebook over the weekend and I can get it to you.

properties.name: Kitchener-Waterloo
properties.notes: RSVP to travisandhanna@gmail.com by Monday night so we can give an update to the bar and know how many sets to print!

properties.name: Knoxville
properties.address: 215 Brookview Centre Way #109, Knoxville, TN 37919, Knoxville, TN

properties.name: London
properties.notes:
At the moment Puzzled Pint London is still running remotely. You're encouraged to join your friends in a video call and solve Puzzled Pint together.

We'll be running the event through our online tool at https://puzzledpint.live/.

You can download the puzzles and check your answers from 7pm on Tuesday

GC will be available to help on request too

properties.name: Los Angeles - Inland Empire
properties.notes: RSVP by sending a Facebook message to www.facebook.com/PuzzledPintIE. Tortas de Birria will be on site!

properties.name: Los Angeles - Northeast
properties.notes:
Easy parking in the parking lot right out front.

Jake and Steph will be there to hand out the puzzle packs! We'll try to get there around 6pm :)

Don't forget to bring pencils!

properties.name: Los Angeles - Santa Monica
properties.notes:
We're back to Santa Monica Brew Works this month! Hope to see you there!

Also of note: we have a Discord now! Join to be notified of future events and other puzzle stuff. https://discord.gg/r9xy45Tas4

properties.name: Madison
properties.notes: RSVPs are optional but appreciated: if you RSVP for your team at gc.madisonpuzzles.com by Tuesday morning, we will be sure to set aside a puzzle set for you. (We will also bring extra sets, so please come even if you haven't RSVP'd!)

properties.name: Manchester
properties.notes:
After a good reception last month we are back at Sandbar Manchester, just off Oxford Road near Manchester Met Uni.

It's a beautiful independent pub with a great range of drinks, and fantastic pizzas!

As always - come in a team and start anytime from 7, or come solo before 7.30pm and we will find you a group.

See you there xxx

properties.name: Melbourne
properties.notes:
We may be seated upstairs.

Please RSVP here so we know how many puzzles to print: https://pp-rsvp.com/VQ3BSN

properties.name: Missoula
properties.notes: See you at GILD at 6 pm! We'll be on the third floor.

properties.name: Montreal
properties.notes: Please RSVP here if you can: https://www.facebook.com/events/1414546562701854

properties.name: Nashville
properties.notes:
We are back in a bar again. Come visit, and RSVP to be sure you get a puzzle set. RSVP at https://forms.gle/13xrcZR3EUDQNGiD9

Look for the Puzzled Pint logo on the table near the door.

properties.name: New York City
properties.address: 300 W 40th St, New York City, NY 10018
properties.notes: New month, new location! We are trying out a new spot which has outdoor potential for future summer months, let us know what you think on the way out - we hope to see you there!

properties.name: Norwich
properties.notes: Call the pub on 01603 464461 if you want to book a table and message us either on Facebook or email to let us know you're coming. We'll need to know how many puzzles to print.

https://www.brewery-x.com/

https://pp-rsvp.com/KN97AX

See you there!

properties.name: Ottawa
properties.notes:
Trying out a new spot this month!

Please let us know you're coming by getting free tickets on eventbrite - it helps us know how many puzzles to print!

Kevin and Steph

properties.name: Oxford
properties.notes: Note that we won't be in the same room we've used before this month. Not sure exactly where we will be but look out for our Puzzled Pint sign!

properties.name: Philadelphia
properties.notes: New location for us!  We will be up on the 2nd floor in the back.  There's a Trivia night in the other section (in case you want to try both at the same time!).

properties.name: Phoenix
properties.notes:
Bring your favorite puzzle solving tools and toys (pencil, eraser, scissors, straight-edge, or whatever).

Hope to see you there! Indoor and outdoor tables. Look for Mark outside.

Trying a new place! Limited parking on site (back), but street parking available on 41st St, and to the west on 40th Pl.

properties.name: Pittsburgh
properties.notes: We're back at East End this month, hopefully the weather will hold up and we can enjoy the outdoor space! They've got pizza and other similar food available, as well as of course their own brewed beers.

properties.name: Portland, Oregon
properties.notes: Join us at a new location in LENTS! ZED is like the Zipper with multiple food options along with beer and cocktails. But unlike the Zipper, it's all indoors for our unreliable spring weather. You may want to bring a source of light as it's a bit on the dark side. See you there!

properties.name: Prague
properties.notes:
The pub does not accept payment cards.

Please fill the RSVP form at https://puzzledpint.sifrovacky.cz/praha.html

properties.name: Raleigh-Durham
properties.notes: Make sure to go to "Lonerider Brewery" and not any of the other Lonerider locations!

properties.name: Seattle - City
properties.notes:
We're running two simultaneous events in Seattle! Please follow the link below to RSVP for the location you will attend:

  • Flying Bike, Greenwood at 8570 Greenwood Ave N (Apple / Google)
  • Azteca Mexican Restaurant, Northgate at 401 NE Northgate Way (Apple / Google)

RSVP here: https://www.eventbrite.com/e/puzzled-pint-seattle-april-2023-tickets-609160795337

(One location may fill up sooner than the other, and we only have enough packets printed for those who register, so be sure to RSVP as early as possible.)

Running two events takes a lot of volunteers! Please talk to us if you're interested in joining the Game Control team.

properties.name: St. Louis
properties.address: 3811 S Lindbergh Blvd, Sunset Hills, MO 63127
properties.notes: Looks like a fun night of Puzzling and Pizza. Please RSVP to the FB event or to r_becker@sbcglobal.net (just one rsvp per team) so we know how many copies to make!

properties.name: Stafford
properties.notes:
Family Friendly. Tuesday Wings Specials. Come by between 6-9.

Stafford Marketplace BWW, off 610

properties.name: Sydney
properties.notes:
As you enter the venue walk straight ahead and down the stairs, we have reserved the whole room at the very back of the venue all for us!

Please bring your own stationery if possible, however we will have things to lend out!

Please like and share our facebook page and leave us a review!

properties.name: Syracuse
properties.notes: UPDATE 2023-04-11 - Our original location for tonight has had to cancel at the last minute. Please join me at Salt City Market instead! I will plan to sit in the market near Juice + Flowers, but it should be a great night to enjoy their patio!

properties.name: Toronto
properties.notes:
Looking forward to seeing everyone this Tuesday, April 11, 2023.

We will be set up at our GC table to help with the puzzles from 6:00 - 9:00 PM

Please join us in the Discord between events for other puzzle-related fun!

Puzzled Pint Toronto is currently overseen by: Michaela and Stu at the GC table and Andria for venue booking and social media

properties.name: Tulsa
properties.bar: The WEL Bar at Mother Road Market
properties.notes: We're back at The WEL Bar at Mother Road Market for April. Game Control will be there from 6:00-9:00 pm. If the weather is nice and the covered patio is open, we'll be on the patio just past The WEL Bar. If not, we'll be at one of the round tables in The WEL Bar area. Look for the Puzzled Pint table topper. This location has loads of drink and food options. You may want to check the website for a map of the parking if you haven't been before. The lot directly to the west usually has spots open. We hope to see you there!

properties.name: Twin Cities
properties.notes:
The Northern Girl food truck should be onsite to feed us.

Please RSVP here by midnight Monday so we can print a packet for your team: https://pp-rsvp.com/A2SYFY

properties.name: Valencia
properties.address: Carrer del Dr. Ferran, 10, Valencia, V 46021
properties.notes:
Join the group on Telegram to stay up to date: https://t.me/puzzledpintvlc

Arrive by 2030 if you want to be placed in a team or arrive at any time before 2130 if you have your own team. We will be there until midnight. The puzzles usually take our teams around 2 hours to complete. Not a problem to come alone, you can complete the puzzles alone or we can help you find a team if you would like one. Ask for the Puzzled Pint and/or the Board Games group. We will occupy both 'sides' of the bar.

properties.name: Victoria
properties.notes:
We will be on the Mezzanine Level - unless that fills up, then there should be space on the lower floor. You can bring your own food in, as they have a limited selection behind the bar.

Please RSVP to chris@enigmaticevents - please tell us approximate team size, or let us know on the facebook Event : https://www.facebook.com/events/549351813971587

See you there!

properties.name: Washington - Arlington/City
properties.notes:
Washington DC-City/Arlington will be back once again at Spider Kelly's in Clarendon. If you are planning to attend, please RSVP to puzzledpintdc@gmail.com so we know how many teams to expect and sets to print.

Also, if interested in more puzzling fun, DCPHR will be running a puzzle hunt on Saturday, May 13. See https://www.eventbrite.com/e/a-lighter-dcphr-gold-rush-2023-tickets-580736497497 for more information. Have questions? Let us know at puzzledpintdc@gmail.com.

properties.name: Wellington
properties.notes:
This month we are upstairs at The Hudson on Chews Lane / Victoria Street!

Please make sure to say you're "Going" on the Facebook event - https://www.facebook.com/events/524990253044565
This is our only metric at the moment for guessing how many sets to print! Save the trees!

No special stationery is required for this month's set, just pens/pencils and maybe a highlighter. As always we'll have some spare if you forget :)

properties.name: Windsor
properties.notes: Excited to be at one of my favourite pubs this month! See you all there!

properties.name: Zurich
properties.notes: This month we're at The Alehouse – Palmhof just up the road from ETH Zentrum (nearest tram stop is ETH/Universitätsspital). See you there!

properties.name: zzz - Burlington
properties.notes: Congrats on solving the location puzzle! We can't wait to see you this month at a new location for us - Pizza 44! Check out our FB page if you have any questions or for updates, see you soon!
